explains: n. 码头，[船]小艇船坞；散步道
n. （Marina）人名；（罗、塞、葡、西、意、英）马里纳，玛丽娜（女名）

sentences.en: After a hearty breakfast of huevos rancheros, a spicy omelette with chopped vegetables and ham, it was time to head for the marina.
sentences.cn: 吃完了丰盛的早餐，有墨西哥式煎蛋，一个辣煎蛋卷配切碎的蔬菜和火腿，是时候去码头了。

sentences.en: Marina ate only one slice of bread.
sentences.cn: 玛丽娜只吃了一片面包。

sentences.en: Marina was a confident, happy child.
sentences.cn: 玛丽娜是个自信、快乐的孩子。
